abstract: The sales increase, after a slowing in September and October, was being closely watched as an indication of the recovery’s staying power.
snippet: The sales increase, after a slowing in September and October, was being closely watched as an indication of the recovery’s staying power.
lead_paragraph: Sales over the Thanksgiving weekend may have been a disappointment for the nation’s retailers, but they were a boon for automakers, lifting their sales in the United States for November to the best rate since before the recession.

headline.main: Out of the Doldrums, Automakers Post Strong U.S. Sales
headline.print_headline: Out of the Doldrums, Automakers Post Strong U.S. Sales
